explains: n. 花环，花冠，花圈；环状物，圈状物；（烟、云等的）环，圈；（纹章）饰环

sentences.en: The Queen laid a wreath at the war memorial.
sentences.cn: 女王向阵亡将士纪念碑献了花圈。

sentences.en: A Christmas wreath exclaiming PEACE ON EARTH hangs on the restaurant door.
sentences.cn: 一个写着“世界和平”的圣诞花环悬挂在饭店的门上。

sentences.en: The coffin lying before the altar was bare, except for a single wreath of white roses.
sentences.cn: 摆在圣坛前的棺材上光秃秃的，只有一个白玫瑰花圈。
